DOC.brief_summary: To study Celebrex versus naproxen to see if it decreases symptoms of juvenile arthritis such as pain and swelling.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Celecoxib Suspension Compared to Naproxen Suspension in Patients With JRA
DOC.criteria: 218 years old with active JRA other experimental meds, recent changes in arthritis meds
